targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "client-address" and
    r.name == "${node}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "node-address" and
    r.name == "${node}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_software_sovrin" and
    r.name == "${node}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_software_indy-node" and
    r.name == "${node}"
  )
  |> yield()

panels.title: Plot to see how it displays
